entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Use recursive patterns" suggests redundant "this is { ... }" pattern #64111
  • CoreCompile is missing Analyzer references in it's stated inputs #64103

Closed

  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Workspaces 4.3.0 bug #64079

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove out of proc TodoList computation #64110
    Area-IDE
  • Improve SymbolDisplay to handle operator symbols that are not valid operators for the target language. #64109
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Use pattern matching for multi-kind checks #64108
    Area-IDE
  • Use patterns to simplify a few checks. #64106
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64105
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Move deserialization code next to serialization code. #64104
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64101
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64102
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64113
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #64112
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers
  • Add ReturnOnly scope #64090
    Area-Compilers
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • `scoped` should set ref escape scope to current block #64093
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Semantic snippets - Turn on experiment + turn off old snippets while new snippet experience is on #63991
    Area-IDE
